name: Last Knight (itch)
description:
Controls: 

Space - Jump 

Jump height is tied to forward momentum.

A - Left  

D - Right 

S - Duck/Crouch 

Right mouse to activate arm cannon .

Left mouse press to fire cannon.

Hold left mouse to charge attack.

Cannon has a charged attack and a super charged attack.

The charge attack is a single second charge, the super charged attack is a 7 second charge.

Super charged shots can damage walls and break shields.

You will run faster with the cannon off.

New Benlands Official Site: newbenland.com 

This game was made for the 8th Chimerical GMC Jam.

Songs:

Main Menu: Heaven and Hell by audio hero
Boss: Killing Machines by audio hero
Ending: Take it All In by ZapSplat

all found at zapsplat.com
